name: Morbius
text: Vampiric Bite — Response: After you use a basic power, drain 1 from an enemy. (Limit once per round.) “If I must drink blood, let it be the blood of the corrupt - of those that deserve to die. The blood of the guilty.”

name: Michael Morbius
text: Setup: Put your Bloodlust upgrade into play. Immortal — Forced Response: After you change to this form, place blood counters on your Bloodlust upgrade (to a maximum of 9).

name: Werewolf
text: Hero Response: After Werewolf enters play, search your discard pile for an identity specific event and add it to your hand. “You don't wanna be around when I sprout fangs again." —Werewolf

name: It's Morbin Time
text: Hero Action (attack/thwart): Deal damage to an enemy equal to Morbius's ATK and remove threat from a scheme equal to his THW. If you have 9 blood counters on Bloodlust, give Morbius a tough status card.

name: Dark Shadows
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. If there are blood counters on each THW slot on Bloodlust, confuse an enemy. "You're vermin. And I am the predator that feeds on your kind. Welcome to the food chain."

name: Taste the Blood
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If there are blood counters on each ATK slot on Bloodlust, this attack gains piercing. "If I must drink blood, let it be the blood of the corrupt —of those that deserve to die!"

name: Fright Night
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. If there are blood counters on each DEF slot, stun the attacking enemy. "Tell me...are you scared now?"

name: Blood of the Vampire
text: Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 1 damage from Morbius and ready him. "Tell me...are you scared now?"

name: Lifeforce
text: Action: Exhaust Lifeforce → play an ally from your hand, reducing its resource cost by X, then deal X damage to it. Response: After an ally you control is defeated, exhaust Lifeforce → shuffle it into your deck instead.

name: Horizon Labs
text: Michael Morbius gets +2 REC. Resource: Exhaust Horizon Labs → generate a [wild] resource. "I am a man of science. My life dedicated to preserving life. Yet around me is the stench of death so strong I can never be rid of it."

name: The Living Vampire
text: You get +3 hit points. Interrupt: When Morbius would be defeated, set his hit point dial to 4 instead. Then, discard this card. "Instead of curing my affliction, I have made it stronger."

name: Psionic Gliding
text: Morbius gains the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Interrupt: When an enemy activates, exhaust Psionic Gliding → deal 1 damage to that enemy or remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Bloodlust
text: Permanent. Setup. Enters play with 9 blood counters covering all slots. Your basic powers are reduced by each uncovered slot. Forced Response: After your turn ends, remove 2 blood counters from a basic power slot here.
